Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.cardrequirements

package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.cardrequirements
This package contains the implementation of the card requirements of Masters of Renaissance.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    CardRequirement
    Leader cards can be activated only if the player owns enough of either: Development cards of a certain color/level Resources of a specified kind
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    DevCardRequirement
    Requirement for leader card activation.
    DevCardRequirement.Entry
    Models a requirement entry.
    ResourceRequirement
    A concrete requirement for leader card activation.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    CardRequirementsNotMetException
    Exception signaling that the player being examined does not meet the specified requirements.
